jx.jx_cn_mean: 见 by 条 by itself

jx.jx_en_mean: viewed in its essential qualities; considered separately from other things

lj.lj_ly: some would say bringing up a family was a full-time job in itself.
lj.lj_ls: 有人说养育子女本身就等于一份全职工作。

entry.def: Itself is used as the object of a verb or preposition when it refers to something that is the same thing as the subject of the verb.

example.ex: Scientists have discovered remarkable new evidence showing how the body rebuilds itself while we sleep...
example.tran: 科学家们已经发现了令人瞩目的新证据,说明了人体在睡眠状态下是如何自我修复的。
失业问题不会自行解决。

entry.def: You use itself to emphasize the thing you are referring to.

example.ex: I think life itself is a learning process...
example.tran: 我认为生活本身就是一个学习的过程。

example.ex: The involvement of the foreign ministers was itself a sign of progress...
example.tran: 外交部长的介入本身就是取得进展的一个标志。

entry.def: If you say that someone is, for example, politeness itself or kindness itself, you are emphasizing they are extremely polite or extremely kind.
entry.tran: (加在抽象名词之后)极度,非常

example.ex: I was never really happy there, although the people were kindness itself...
example.tran: 我在那里从来没有真正高兴过,虽然那里的人们非常亲切。

Sentence.sentence: Macy's has been moving aggressively to try to remake itself for a new era of shopping.

sentences.en: The arrow embedded itself in the wall.

sentences.en: This trifle developed itself into a serious problem.
sentences.cn: 这件小事已发展成一个很严重的问题。

sentences.en: The land itself is worth the money, without the house.
sentences.cn: 不算房子, 这地皮本身就值那些钱。</seg>

sentences.en: The cat was washing itself.

sentences.cn: 公司本身陷入了困境。

sentences.cn: 那支队伍无须自鸣得意。
sentences.en: There's no need for the team to feel proud of itself.

sentences.cn: 村子本身很美，但周围的田野相当单调。
sentences.en: The village itself is pretty, but the surrounding countryside is rather dull.

sentences.cn: 旅馆经理彬彬有礼。
sentences.en: The manager of the hotel was courtesy itself.

sentences.en: The machine will start by itself in a few seconds.

sentences.en: The house stands by itself in an acre of land.

sentences.cn: 这本身并不是个难解决的问题。
sentences.en: In itself, it's not a difficult problem to solve.

sentences.cn: 它未能独占市场。
sentences.en: It doesn't have the market to itself.

sentences.cn: 科学家们已经发现了令人瞩目的新证据,说明了人体在睡眠状态下是如何自我修复的。
sentences.en: Scientists have discovered remarkable new evidence showing how the body rebuilds itself while we sleep...

sentences.en: Unemployment does not correct itself.

sentences.cn: 我认为生活本身就是一个学习的过程。
sentences.en: I think life itself is a learning process...

sentences.cn: 外交部长的介入本身就是取得进展的一个标志。
sentences.en: The involvement of the foreign ministers was itself a sign of progress...

sentences.cn: 我在那里从来没有真正高兴过,虽然那里的人们非常亲切。
sentences.en: I was never really happy there, although the people were kindness itself...

sentences.cn: 许多男人非常有魅力。
sentences.en: Many men are charm itself...

sentences.cn: 我只可以有一周的时间进行依次旅行.
sentences.en: I can only be away for a week for a trip.

sentences.cn: 这弯曲的金属片自己可以变直.
sentences.en: The bent strip can straighten up by itself.

sentences.cn: 这时她脑中浮现出一个想法.
sentences.en: Then an idea suggested itself to her.

sentences.cn: 我们的人造卫星本身将绕月球运行两天的时间.
sentences.en: Our satellite itself will orbit around the moon for a period of two days.

sentences.cn: 库存局面正在恢复正常.
sentences.en: The inventory situation was righting itself.

sentences.cn: 绳子把轮子缠住, 电动机就不转了.
sentences.en: The rope had twisted itself around the wheel, stopping the motor.

sentences.cn: 门怎么自己开了?
sentences.en: How did the door open by itself?

sentences.cn: 是否头脑发现了给头脑松绑这件事它自己是无法去做的.
sentences.en: Is it the deconditioning of the brain which it finds itself unable to do?

sentences.cn: 我核对证据,确定进化的目标正是它自己.
sentences.en: I tally the evidence and say that evolution moves towards itself.

sentences.cn: 爱除了成全它自己,没有别的欲望.
sentences.en: Love has no other desire but to fulfil itself.

sentences.cn: 他是一个气垫船, 不过不像RA2里的气垫船,它自己有武装.
sentences.en: It is a hovercraft, but unlike the RA 2 transports it can defend itself.

sentences.cn: 那条狗咬它自己.
sentences.en: The dog bit itself.

sentences.cn: 甚至可以说谷歌也是它自己的平台, 只是它很开放.
sentences.en: Even Google a platform unto itself, a very open one.

sentences.cn: 不久, 结晶将会找到它自己在小宇宙中的安顿位置.
sentences.en: Before long, the crystal will find itself settled in the petit universe.

sentences.cn: 每一个灵魂就会在它自己里面拥抱全部的情感.
sentences.en: Each soul shall embrace all emotions within itself.

sentences.cn: 当某个规则的等号右边的第一个元素是它自己的时候,就产生了左递归.
sentences.en: Left recursion happens when you have a rule that calls itself before anything else.

sentences.cn: “破坏自己土地的国家就是在残害它自己. ”
sentences.en: The nation that destroys its soil destroys itself.

sentences.cn: 然而, 1987年之后很短的时间,调和被集中, 前苏联都是因为它自己而解体.
sentences.en: However, shortly after 1987 and the Harmonic Convergence, the Soviet Union fell over all by itself.

sentences.cn: 但是一朵曾经看过旭日东升的花,也能看到在它自己里面有某种东西在上升.
sentences.en: But a flower that has seen the sunrise also seen something arise within itself.

sentences.cn: 九月真的不止一个月; 它是一个季节, 成就它自己.
sentences.en: September is more than a month, really; it is a season, an achievement in itself.

sentences.cn: 真理引起了反对它自己的狂风骤雨,那场风雨吹散了真理的广播的种子.
sentences.en: Truth raises against itself the storm that scatters its seeds broadcast.

sentences.cn: 一个水库, 不管规模有多大, 仅靠它自己是没有办法引发地震的,这个观点已基本上为科学家们所公认.
sentences.en: Scientists generally agree that a reservoir, no matter how big, cannot by itself cause earthquake.

sentences.cn: 《博伽梵歌》指出了它自己本身就是一本“奥义书”.
sentences.en: The Bhagavad Gita refers to itself as an Upanishad.

sentences.cn: 生命只是纯粹地享受它自己 、 欢欣它自己、能量洋益著 、 舞蹈著, 没有任何目的.
sentences.en: Life simply enjoying itself, delighting in itself. Energy overflowing, dancing, for no purpose at all.

sentences.cn: 蘑菇煎蛋卷正在用筷子吃它自己.
sentences.en: The mushroom omelet was eating itself with chopsticks.

sentences.cn: 我讨厌我的狗全身上下地舔它自己.
sentences.en: I hate when my dog licks itself all over.

sentences.cn: 规则的右边可以是其他规则, 包括它自己.
sentences.en: The right hand side of a rule may reference other rules, including itself.

sentences.cn: 你里面有一条虫想要表达它自己.
sentences.en: There is a worm in you that wants to express itself.

sentences.cn: 麻疹它自己本身通常不是直接导致死亡.
sentences.en: Measles itself is usually not a direct cause of death.

sentences.cn: 心能与它自己合拍, 好来同情、安慰.
sentences.en: And a heart at leisure from itself, to soothe and sympathize.

sentences.cn: 往往, 问题它自己被重构了而转变为一个新的问题.
sentences.en: Often, the problem itself is reconstructed and becomes a new one.

sentences.cn: 思想以他自己的语言喂养它自己而成长起来了.
sentences.en: Thought feeds itself with its own words and grows.

sentences.cn: 在编辑理论中, 残缺应该有它自己的席位.
sentences.en: In editorial theory, incompleteness will occupy itself place.

sentences.cn: 1853年以前,防腐油已作为最可靠并能持久的木材防腐剂,而确立了它自己的地位.
sentences.en: By 1853 creosote had established itself as a most reliable and persistent wood preservative.

sentences.cn: 你的步枪与它自己斗争且每次都赢了.
sentences.en: Your rifle has fought against itself and won every time.

sentences.cn: 一个窗体不能是它自己的子窗体并且一个报表不能是它自己的子报表.
sentences.en: A form can't be a subform within itself and report can't be a subreport within itself.

sentences.cn: 他指出，不平等是危险的，不仅是因为富人和穷人之间的巨大鸿沟看上去就不好，更是因为它本身就破坏了向上的流动，让穷人更难摆脱贫穷。
sentences.en: Inequality is dangerous, he argued, not merely because it doesn ’ t look good to have a large gap between the rich and the poor, but because inequality itself destroys upward mobility, making it harder for the poor to escape from poverty.

sentences.cn: 客观性是相对于主观性而言的, 而且它本身就包含着主观性.
sentences.en: Objectivity is subjective in terms of relative to, and it contains in itself subjective.

sentences.cn: 安装程序的父级不能等于它本身.
sentences.en: An installer's parent cannot be equal to itself.

sentences.cn: 钱只是一种能创造出比它本身价值大得多的劳动工具.
sentences.en: Money can only be the useful drudge of things immeasurably higher than itself.

sentences.cn: 从本质上讲, 它本身并不是“债务”, 而只是可能的债务,具有隐匿性和不确定性.
sentences.en: By nature, it is not debt in itself, but possible debt with concealment and uncertainty.

sentences.cn: 数字化虚拟人的研究有它本身的哲学基础.
sentences.en: The studying methodology of digital virtual human contents philosophical bases in itself.

sentences.cn: 牧师立即意识到这匹马会带来不幸, 或许它本身就是个魔鬼!
sentences.en: The priest realized at once that this horse was evil, perhaps even devil itself!

sentences.cn: 整数1只能被它本身整除, 所以不是素数.
sentences.en: The integer 1 is divisible only by itself; it is not a prime.

sentences.cn: 每个消费计划至少和它本身一样好.
sentences.en: Any bundle is at least as good as itself.

sentences.cn: 画框漂亮了,但它本身并不是关注对象所在.
sentences.en: The frame enhances but is not itself the subject of attention.

sentences.cn: 铀不同于其它商品, 它本身并不在任何交易所进行交易.
sentences.en: Unlike other commodities, uranium itself does not trade on any exchanges.

sentences.cn: 这可能听起来有点复杂, 但它本身很简单.
sentences.en: This may sound complicated, but it is simplicity itself.

sentences.cn: 对这份成绩报告单不需要用什么评论; 它本身已经说明问题了.
sentences.en: There is little need to comment on this school record; It'speaks for itself.

sentences.cn: 在附近投射一个控制面积它本身, 让其他的要在它的附近被建造的建筑物.
sentences.en: Projects a Control Area around itself, allowing other buildings to be built near it.

sentences.cn: 法律不是去阻止罪行,它本身反而变成邪恶的罪行, 而本来期望邪恶得到它的惩罚!
sentences.en: Instead of checking crime, the law itself guilty of the evils it is supposed to punish!

sentences.cn: 不幸的是, 电视传达的东西没有道德感,因为它本身与道德无关.
sentences.en: Unfortunately, television conveys no sense of morality since it is itself amoral.

sentences.cn: 它本身就是引进的三菱车, 这样整车与动力总成的匹配就更协调.
sentences.en: It itself is the introduction of Mitsubishi cars, and this vehicle powertrain matching more coordination.

sentences.cn: 一个氏族成员的名字就赋予它本身以氏族成员的权力.
sentences.en: A gentile name conferred of itself gentile rights.
